Attributes.description: The process of marketing research including topics such as problem/opportunity formulation, research objectives, data sources, research instrument design, sampling, data collection and processing and methods of data analysis.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: COMM 296 and one of COMM 190, COMM 290 and one of COMM 191, COMM 291 and one of COMM 295, ECON 201, ECON 301.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
